item.title: How I Improved the Loading Speed of My Blog
item.description: In this post I’m going to demonstrate the steps I took in order to improve the loading speed of my blog. First of all, this blog is generated by Jekyll, the static site generator. I only build my static files and deploy them to GitHub pages. I use Webpack to compile my assets and then I use Jekyll to build the whole blog. Around a year ago, I started on a mission to optimize the loading speed of my blog after feeling that it was slow and had some rendering issues.
